text: Donald Garrow (25 January 1918 - 25 February 2001) was a British alpine skier. He competed in three events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2001 deaths Category:British male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Great Britain Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:People from Cuckfield
title: Donald Garrow
